title: andreloja
author: andreloja
content: Hey everyone! I would love to invite everyone to visit Madeira Island, in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean, for a pure signal BTC conference plus vacations.Check it out at bitcoinatlantis.comCheers

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.body: Assuming this news is legit... If anyone is attending, this is the best place to bring kids ages 14 - 16 (especially those people who push Bitcoin education to kids) since kids age 16 and below are free to enter the events and the stated range of age have already a grasp of the economic activities.Â  I wonder if these kids are also included on the L3 ticket featured lists.I also think it is a good way to spend a traveling vacation while attending the Bitcoin conference, they can also visit the tourist spot of that island.Â  Hitting two birds with one stone.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Quote from: andreloja on September 04, 2023, 05:41:01 PMI would love to invite everyone to visit Madeira Island, in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean, for a pure signal BTC conference plus vacations.I am just interested in an invitation, but because the distance where I live is too far from that event place, is there any solution for people to join without getting a flight there? comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Quote from: DVlog on September 04, 2023, 05:46:42 PM42 euro for an event is not bad. Who are the organizers? I have just checked it seems legit to me. This is exclusive to local residents though. You'll have to pay at least 240 euros if you want to participate if you're the average joe. Not sure if that's worth the money since the next level costs four times as much. I guess the VIP label is really expensive for a conference like this. I can't check anything on their Twitter since I don't have an account, but it seems like the organizer is called Free Madeira. Their sponsors are also unknown to me. I'd say better wait and see before buying anything.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Quote from: joniboini on September 05, 2023, 01:23:34 AM-snip-but it seems like the organizer is called Free Madeira. You're right, that's the name of a local organization apparently empowered by the Portuguese government dedicated to the development of the Bitcoin ecosystem. Several speakers at the event are members of the organization's management.But I haven't seen confirmation from other well-known figures like Dorsey and Saylor that they will be speakers. Let's just say your goal is to have a vacation on the island instead of attending an event, that area is indeed a tourist spot.

comments.author: sesterceshop
comments.body: A few years ago, I had a wonderful vacation there. I visited Pico do Arieiro, the third-highest peak on the island. The views were breathtaking. I remember seeing the lush green mountains and crystal-clear waters. It was truly a magical experience that I will never forget. ðŸ˜Š Hopefully this is not a scam as I would like to visit again and check out the event.
